Positive_Review: Very nice hotel and big room compared to a typical hotel room in Paris The condition of the room was spotless Hotel staff was great and helpful

Negative_Review: I booked a room of luxe but i didnt see at all how this room is different from regular room NOTHING SPECIAL AT ALL The room is very Very small and i m 100 sure i can find some room way better than this with 380 euros one night bad experience even the frontdesk is fine
Positive_Review: Location ok stuff ok things are new

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Amazing Helpful staff beautiful facility excellent location This hotel made a great start for our stay in Paris Had everything you could want Very comfortable nights sleep

Negative_Review: The bedrooms and bathrooms are small You cannot easily put a suitcase on the floor and walk around the room The elevators are also small The front desk personnel is just OK not very friendly
Positive_Review: The location is great Very near to the Champs Elys es Many restaurants and shopping facilities around

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Best option Great location beautiful facilities the breakfast is super complete Bathroom great with excellent shower The bed was great and the pillows were perfect The staff is always ready to help you at everything

Negative_Review: Wifi was terrible we stayed 3 nights and blnibidy ever cleaned our room or brought fresh towels and when we called to ask for them they complained about the request
Positive_Review: Awesome bed decent location

Negative_Review: Shower was not made for big people like me
Positive_Review: Fantastic ambiance at a top A location in the golden triangle of Paris Super beds big and longer than usual in hotels

Negative_Review: Lobby check in area outdated small TV could not find wifi code in the room
Positive_Review: Great location with value for money the bed was really nice and great shower

Negative_Review: Checkout was a little stressful as despite arranging a later checkout before they wanted to charge us a day rate
Positive_Review: Nice comfortable bed and lovely decor Quiet location

Negative_Review: as above
Positive_Review: Lovely clean rooms beautiful bar lounge area we had a couple of problems on arrival our t v wouldn t work and 4 times someone visited the room to try and fix it then said it would need to wait until the next day the next day we reported it still wasn t fixed after arriving back from the day we were told we needed to contact sales but we were leaving the next day so that was a waste of time we asked to be moved rooms and were told there were none but after explaining this was a trip for my mum and we didn t wish to be out in the evening they eventually moved us The advert stated all rooms had a balcony however ours didn t nor were we able to open the curtains net like to see a view The room was very dark We were advised there were no rooms available with a balcony The spa is only for treatments and doesn t have a sauna or Jacuzzi or small pool and the gym had 1 treadmill and a weight machine but nothing more

Negative_Review: The reception staff were frosty bordering unfriendly There are no water or ice stations located anywhere in the hotel For 22 the breakfast options are ridiculous The rooms are really close together with narrow awkward hallways Good luck staying up late around 10pm and not getting a call to turn your tv off really There is no glass or curtain on the shower so the entire bathroom floor ends up covered in water when taking a shower Even attempting to jam myself up against the faucet into the 16 square that s created by the side of the sink didn t helped I m a skinny girl and the place still got drenched I ve stayed in hotels all over the world and this hotel is nothing special The pictures make it far grander than it is I m not a fan of European hotels but I m pretty sure you can find better for the money in Paris I was very disappointed with my stay here
Positive_Review: Location is good The hotel is on a quiet street but just steps away from restaurants pharmacy and coffee shops etc

Negative_Review: The room was small for the price and the sound proofing was not good The people in the room above were clearly unawares that their activities were disturbing others until at least 2AM
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed proper pillows adequate table for writing good wi fi well equipped bathroom

Negative_Review: The glass wall in our bath shower was very short which caused the bathroom to be partially wet after showering The rest was all perfect
Positive_Review: Overall atmosphere of the hotel we had a room with a balcony which was very nice and spacious with a table and two chairs Comfortabel bed

Negative_Review: The room was clean but had cob webs off the lights and could have been cleaned more thoroughly
Positive_Review: The staff were very welcoming and it was a beautiful room and well thought out for the size It is a boutique style hotel so did not expect a huge room Location was excellent No restaurant so no breakfast to rate

Negative_Review: Our room was in the attic and on arrival smelled like a sewer Very basic amenities for the cost of the room It was a strange layout with very little space to walk around the bed however there was a long hallway to the door
Positive_Review: Staff at the hotel were very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: An iron was not available to us in the evening when needed
Positive_Review: The location and staff were excellent Within walking distance of all major sites in Paris and hugely helpful staff especially Alex the bar manager

Negative_Review: Hawa at the front desk was rude and impatient as we were checking out She kept on making comments under her breath which made me feel really uncomfortable
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Room temperature was often too hot or too cold in the night Bathroom was a little small so while I loved the water pressure I was often fearful of soaking the bathroom When the room was cleaned it was not thorough While the beds were made and the floors tidied cleaned mugs were not replaced with fresh tea coffee sugar and creamer The lady at the front desk when checking out was not very friendly
Positive_Review: Nice amenities and toiletries Nice decor Fantastic Water pressure The gentleman at the bar was very helpful in finding somewhere nearby for us to eat The hotel was reasonably close to the Champs Elysees which was very convenient for our New Years Eve stay we saw the fireworks at the Arch de Triumph

Negative_Review: TV did not work in the room
Positive_Review: Provided you go for the luxury room you have enough space more than usual in Paris hotels there is a nice bar and spa including a small fitness facility The hotel has also a nice sitting area Cosy hotel

Negative_Review: Serving staff at breakfast took a long time to respond and there were no vegetarian options for a cooked breakfast even though I had requested this There were 2 3 staff which is inefficient use of resources especially as no cooking was required Very expensive prices at the bar 2 g t was 30 And beauty treatments 160 for a massage The hotel appeared opulent at first glance but there was flaky paint and stains on furnishings that I wouldn t expect of such a highly rated hotel During one breakfast meal there were 2 unaccompanied children and one child pocketed lots of packets if nutella and the other ate very little from a big plate of food They seemed to be very familiar with the waiting staff and I wondered if they were actually guests I would prefer the hotel to spend on guests and reduce high prices than on waste I wouldn t return for this reason poor value for money
Positive_Review: Great location with excellent reception staff who welcomed us Enjoyed the Hammam loved the Hermes bathing products robes and slippers plus the room was cleaned every day Lots of croissants and pastries in the morning Our room was very quiet and we felt secure

Negative_Review: I was excited to have a good stay in this hotel for the good location but unfortunately I shocked with the not clear and honest description for the facilities and rules they forced me to pay more and change my room and its not my fault to not have a good details in booking proceeded and I didn t have a good welcome by staff in arriving and the bathroom smell was disgusting they said through booking com all children under 12 are free for stay and that not true the booking com couldn t do anything and this is not the first time I had trouble with the booking com and they can t solve it before only saying sorry for what happen to you so this is the last time to book through them the hotel need to change their staff specially the night shift and have to fix their bathrooms and change their details of the facilities and the rules and we will see if booking com they clear to but my comments and review
Positive_Review: Only the location every things were offal

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Great location in Paris and nice staff This is my 2nd time at this hotel and I will definitely go back The breakfast is good and was included in my room

Negative_Review: I would not recommend the Spa treatments The cost does not justify the experience 180 for 90mins treatment with a very nice well meaning therapist only rather young inexperienced so it was more like a 50 euro experience for over 3 x that Maybe that was just my luck of the draw But I would be remiss not to draw attention to the possibility it could happen to other customers For that money we should flamin well get champagne a bodyscrub a bodywrap and maybe some canap s IMHO Because otherwise one feels somewhat fleeced Alternatively I would advise charging sensible prices for the simple experience provided We don t even pay those prices in London and that s saying summat
Positive_Review: I thought the staff were wonderful The hotel was just as gorgeous as the photos Very comfortable Very relaxed No complaints at all Even happy to accommodate a late checkout Class

Negative_Review: The bar was closed early in the evening You re squeezed in a tiny shower under the roof on the top floor No English TV channels only 8 French channels
Positive_Review: More than you expect when you get into the room

Negative_Review: At the reception middle aged guy wouldn t feel and think for the customer but insisted only the opinions and reasons of hotel s repeatedly for lots of time even the same way and the same words I thought he had to be a foolish stupid or too poor ability to understand what the customer s saying That must be crazy from Algeria aha of course a lady at the reception were not so bad looking but easily I could esteem she also not so smart brain and mind must be broken UNDOUBTEDLY
Positive_Review: young staff are all so kind and friendly soooo good Breakfast was also delicious not so many kinds but tasted good indeed

Negative_Review: The air conditioning did not work and the room was extremely hot which was in part due to the heat coming from the minibar A fire alarm went off in the middle of the night and the staff were nowhere to be found and no explanation given The shower leaked all over the bathroom floor

Negative_Review: No coffee machine Just a water kettle with coffee

Positive_Review: The hotel was clean and the staff were very friendly and helpful The rooms were lovely and well decorated The hotel is in a good location very close to the Arc De Triomphe and the Champs Alysees and within easy reach of the Eiffel Tower I would recommend this Hotel to anyone

Negative_Review: Although there were quite a few guests bar and spa were never staffed Got a drink once by asking at reception and they sent someone round to it Spa never EVER had anyone there It s a shame because that s why I booked hotel but never got to use it
Positive_Review: Room was very clean and comfortable I asked for a quiet room and that is exactly what I got I never heard a soul Breakfast was adequate but not worth 21 Euro mine was included in my package so it was fine Good location if you want to shop like staying just off of Bond St in London but there are better areas However easy to get to other places on Metro Couple of staff really helpful in aiding us to buy and print tickets for the football others quite nonchalant C est Paris
